attributes.action: Make long term unemployed poeple do community service to improve the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With a number of services struggling and our streets that need cleaning, poeple who are unemployed long term should do community servce to improve our community. This would be an excellent way of encouring poeple into work as well as limiting unemployed payouts as well as making best use of an untapped resource. This would be an excellent way of improving our economy and also making the streets more attractive for all including visitors. With a number of poeple happy to rely on pay outs and not work it is about time we used them to get our services up to scatch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
